sen.j: 岩倉具堯（いわくら ともたか、生年不詳 - 寛永10年（1633年））は室町時代後期頃から江戸時代初期の公家。
sen.e: Tomotaka IWAKURA (year of birth unknown - 1633) was a Court noble in the period from around the latter half of the Muromachi period through the beginning of the Edo Period.

sen.j: 最終官位は正五位木工寮。
sen.e: His final court rank was Shogoi (Senior Fifth Rank) Mokuryo (Bureau of Carpentry).

sen.e: He is an ancestor of Iwakura family, which was a branch family of Koga family of Murakami-Genji (Minamoto clan).

sen.j: 京都洛外の岩倉に邸をおいたため、久我家から分家して岩倉家を興した。
sen.e: Since he located his household in Iwakura, which was at Rakugai (outside of the capital Kyoto), he established the Iwakura family, splitting from the Koga family.

sen.e: Tomomi IWAKURA, a meritorious retainer in the Meiji Restoration, was his descendant.

sen.j: その間に岩倉具起（従二位権中納言）、千種有能（千種家を再興、正二位権大納言）、葉室頼豊（正二位権大納言）の室、坊城俊完（従二位権大納言）の室を儲けた。
